keys: Estudios de construcción. Construcción interna. Páginas web relevantes

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>934</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Crossword - Stairs</string>
            <string language="es">Crucigrama - Escaleras</string>
            <string language="ga">Crosfhocal – Staighre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreuzworträtsel - Treppe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mots croisé - Escaliers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crossword - Escadas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parole incrociate - Scale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σταυρόλεξο - σκαλοπάτια</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive crossword(Requires Java) which covers terms and definations relating to Stairs and stair construction Can be compeleted online or on a printed sheet.</string>
            <string language="es">Un crucigrama interactivo (requiere Java) que trata sobre los términos y las definiciones relativas a escaleras y la construcción de escaleras. Puede ser cumplimentado en línea o en una hoja impresa.</string>
            <string language="ga">Crosfhocal idirghníomhach (Teastaíonn Java) a chlúdaíonn téarmaí agus sainmhínithe a bhaineann le staighre agus tógáil staighre. Is féidir é a dhéanamh ar líne nó ar bhileog priontáilte.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Construction Studies</string>
            <string language="es">Estudios de construcción. Construcción interna. Páginas web relevantes</string>
            <string language="ga">Staidéar Tógála</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Internal Construction</string>
            <string language="ga">Tógáil Inmheánach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Relevant Websites</string>
            <string language="ga">Láithreáin Ghréasáin Bhainteacha</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive crossword(Requires Java) welches 
Bezeichnungen umfaßt und die definations in bezug auf sind Treppe und
Treppe Aufbau sein können compeleted online oder auf einem gedruckten
Blatt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Crossword(Requires interactifs Java) ce qui couvre
des limites et les definations concernant les escaliers et la 
construction d'escalier peuvent être compeleted en ligne ou sur une 
feuille imprimée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crossword(Requires interativos Java) qual cobre 
termos e os definations que se relacionam às escadas e à 
construção da escada podem ser compeleted em linha ou em uma folha 
impressa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Crossword(Requires interattivi Java) quale 
riguarda i termini ed i definations concernenti le scale e la 
costruzione della scala possono essere compeleted in linea o su un 
foglio stampato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα διαλογικό crossword(Requires Ιάβα) όποιος 
καλύπτει τους όρους και τα definations σχετικά με τα σκαλοπάτια
και την κατασκευή σκαλοπατιών μπορούν να είναι on-line ή σε 
ένα τυπωμένο φύλλο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufbau-Studien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interner Aufbau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Relevante Web site</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Études de Construction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Construction Interne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sites Web Appropriés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudos Da Construção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Construção Interna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Web site Relevantes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi Della Costruzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Costruzione Interna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχετικοί ιστοχώροι</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
